DialogBox
xpos

byte : text x pos

ypos

byte : text y pos

ptr

byte : pointer to current text

font

byte : font to use

wait

byte : wait for x frame

spd

byte : speed

bip

byte : bip sound

spa

byte : line spacing

xstart

byte : starting x position

ystart

byte : starting y position

flags

byte :

.......I
       +-- waiting for Input

xoff - byte: maximum x offset reached (width=xoff-xstart)

size: 16 bytes

Constants
DIALOGBOX_SIZE

size of struct DialogBox in power of 2

Default DialobBox values
DEFAULT_X

$02

DEFAULT_Y

$11

DEFAULT_FONT

0

DEFAULT_WAIT

0

DEFAULT_SPD

4

DEFAULT_BIP

0

DEFAULT_SPACING

2
